class.name: NumberTransformer

javadoc.text: Subclasses implementing this interface can transform Objects to doubles.
javadoc.version: $Id: NumberTransformer.java 1416643 2012-12-03 19:37:14Z tn $ * No longer extends Serializable since 2.0

javadoc.text: Implementing this interface provides a facility to transform * from Object to Double.
javadoc.param: o the Object to be transformed.
javadoc.return: the double value of the Object.
javadoc.throws: MathIllegalArgumentException if the Object can not be transformed into a Double.
